numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Many young women reach out to their parents more than many young men.
3. Many young women visit their parents more than many young men.
4. Texting is more frequent than speaking.
5. I wonder why many women reach out to their parents or their family more than many men.
6. I wonder why many men do not value these relationships as much as many women.
7. This relates to me and my community.
8. Many high school students get older over time.
9. Many college students get older over time.
10. As these students get older, they tend to lose contact with their family.
11. As these students get older, they tend to become wrapped up in their own separate lives.
12. The headline could be: Do women tend to care more about family connections and communication?
